name: sla-services
description: SLA Service for Bakti and Internal SLA management

scripts.prisma:generate: npm run prisma:generate:sla && npm run prisma:generate:loggers
scripts.prisma:generate:sla: cross-env PRISMA_SCHEMA=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma PRISMA_DATABASE_URL=$SLA_DATABASE_URL npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:push: npm run prisma:push:sla && npm run prisma:push:loggers
scripts.prisma:push:sla: cross-env PRISMA_SCHEMA=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma PRISMA_DATABASE_URL=$SLA_DATABASE_URL npx prisma db push --schema=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:sla: cross-env PRISMA_SCHEMA=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma PRISMA_DATABASE_URL=$SLA_DATABASE_URL npx prisma migrate dev --schema=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:deploy:sla: cross-env PRISMA_SCHEMA=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma PRISMA_DATABASE_URL=$SLA_DATABASE_URL npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:deploy: npm run prisma:deploy:sla && npm run prisma:deploy:loggers
scripts.prisma:studio:sla: cross-env PRISMA_SCHEMA=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma PRISMA_DATABASE_URL=$SLA_DATABASE_URL npx prisma studio --schema=prisma/sla-db/schema.prisma
